issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Launch default tabbed application project using Android emulator or Browser emulator. (Also after computer wakes up after hybernation mode, regular browser preview failes with 'unable to connect' error).

h3. Actual Result
An error is thrown in 'Console' window, stating Emulator exited with code 1.

h3. Expected Result
Emulator launched
fields.summary: Unable to launch Browser emulator or Android emlator

comments.body: We have not been able to reproduce this issue with either "Mobile Web Preview in Browser" or "Mobile Web Preview on Android Emulator" with the latest 3.2.0 GA Studio and SDK release. I would appreciate if you can upgrade to the latest 3.2.0 GA release and let us know if the issue persists.
